title: RI, CT attorneys general move to join forces with Revolution Wind developers in case against feds
description: Rhode Island and Connecticut attorneys general filed to consolidate their lawsuit against the Trump administration over the Revolution Wind project.
content: Rhode Island and Connecticut attorneys general filed to consolidate their lawsuit against the Trump administration over the Revolution Wind project.
